mapper.sql: id as id , areaId as areaId , month as month , years as years , status as status , createDate as createDate , lastModDate as lastModDate , creator as creator , lastModifier as lastModifier , content as content
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_schedule ( areaId, month, years, status, createDate, lastModDate, creator, lastModifier, content ) VALUES ( #{areaId}, #{month}, #{years}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{lastModDate}, #{creator}, #{lastModifier}, #{content} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_schedule
areaId = #{areaId},
month = #{month},
years = #{years},
status = #{status},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
creator = #{creator},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
content = #{content},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_schedule
areaId = #{map.areaId},
month = #{map.month},
years = #{map.years},
status = #{map.status},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
content = #{map.content},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_schedule ( areaId, month, years, status, createDate, lastModDate, creator, lastModifier, content ) VALUES ( #{map.areaId}, #{map.month}, #{map.years}, #{map.status}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.content} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zgk_schedule
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND areaId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.areaId} , '%')
AND month like CONCAT('%', #{condition.month} , '%')
AND years like CONCAT('%', #{condition.years} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND content like CONCAT('%', #{condition.content} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
